name: Dipak Shekhar
my_business:
Dreams is a Creative Video Production agency founded by Dipak Shekhar, whose portfolio spans over 15 feature films & 100+ successful video projects and independent film ventures. Built on a foundation of cinematic storytelling, strategic insight, and technical precision, Dreams is positioned as a next-generation production house committed to delivering elevated brand narratives and immersive event experiences.
We specialize in high-quality digital video production and event management solutions, designed to align with your brand’s identity, marketing goals, and target audience. Whether you’re launching a new product, hosting a corporate event, or executing a digital storytelling campaign — we are your collaborative partners in ideation, execution, and excellence.
top_product: Corporate Film TV or Social Media Advertisement Line Production & Fixer
ideal_referral: Production Houses, Advertising Agencies,, Brand Owners & Founders, Marketing Heads, Investors who are investing in feature films, Business head of OTT Platfroms.
top_problem_solved: 1. During my tenure at Colors Gujarati Channel of Star India Pvt Ltd (formerly known as Viacom18), I successfully executed show launch promo campaigns valued at approximately ₹1 crore, achieving around 15% cost savings through strategic planning and vendor negotiations. 2. Proud to have Gandhi & Co. win the National Award for Best Children’s Film — a testament to my commitment to quality and operational precision 3. Led complex productions during COVID-19, ensuring safety, compliance, and seamless delivery in challenging conditions.

name: Dr. Priti Patel
my_business: I run a modern dental clinic with over 9 years of professional experience in providing high-quality dental care. My focus is on creating a comfortable and friendly environment for patients while delivering the best possible treatment outcomes.
top_product: 1. Comprehensive Dental Check-ups – Regular preventive care and early detection of dental issues. 2. Root Canal Treatments – Advanced pain-free endodontic care. 3. Cosmetic Dentistry – Smile designing, teeth whitening, and aesthetic restorations. 4. Oral Cancer Screening & Awareness – Early diagnosis and patient education for oral cancer. 5. Treatment for Limited Mouth Opening & Oral Submucous Fibrosis – Specialized care for patients with restricted jaw movement. 6. Dental IMPLANTS
ideal_referral: • Individuals with tooth pain, cavities, or sensitivity. • People looking for cosmetic dentistry (teeth whitening, smile makeover, veneers). • Patients needing orthodontic treatment (braces, aligners). • Families looking for a reliable family dentist. • Professionals preparing for important life events (marriage, interviews, photo shoots). • Parents needing regular dental checkups for kids. •. Patients with oral cancer and restricted mouth opening.”
top_problem_solved: One of my remarkable cases was Mr. Himmatbhai Patel, who reported with a mouth opening of only 10 mm. After performing corrective surgery, his mouth opening improved to three fingers, which allowed us to proceed with a full-mouth implant rehabilitation. At his initial visit, his weight was 40 kg. Remarkably, within three months after completion of treatment, he had gained 12 kg, reflecting both functional and nutritional improvement.
